commit.message:
configure.in (GDB_TK): Add tcl directories conditional on gdb/gdbtk directory being present.

2003-01-06  Andrew Cagney  <ac131313@redhat.com>

	* configure.in (GDB_TK): Add tcl directories conditional on
	gdb/gdbtk directory being present.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r60943

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2003-01-06  Andrew Cagney  <ac131313@redhat.com>
+
+	* configure.in (GDB_TK): Add tcl directories conditional on
+	gdb/gdbtk directory being present.
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+	
 2003-01-04 John David Anglin  <dave.anglin@nrc.ca>
 
 	* configure.in (LD): Improve test for gcc.  Try to set LD to the ld used

@@ -2363,11 +2363,23 @@ done
 # so we should be able to put the 'maybe's in unconditionally and
 # leave out the maybe dependencies when enable_gdbtk is false.  I'm not
 # 100% sure that that's safe though.
+
+gdb_tk="maybe-all-tcl maybe-all-tk maybe-all-itcl maybe-all-tix maybe-all-libgui"
 case "$enable_gdbtk" in
   no)
     GDB_TK="" ;;
+  yes)
+    GDB_TK="${gdb_tk}" ;;
   *)
-    GDB_TK="maybe-all-tcl maybe-all-tk maybe-all-itcl maybe-all-tix maybe-all-libgui" ;;
+    # Only add the dependency on gdbtk when GDBtk is part of the gdb
+    # distro.  Eventually someone will fix this and move Insight, nee
+    # gdbtk to a separate directory.
+    if test -d ${srcdir}/gdb/gdbtk ; then
+      GDB_TK="${gdb_tk}"
+    else
+      GDB_TK=""
+    fi
+    ;;
 esac
 
 # Create the 'maybe dependencies'.  This uses a temporary file.
@@ -2713,7 +2725,7 @@ test -n "$target_alias" && ncn_target_tool_prefix=$target_alias-
   # Extract the first word of "${ncn_tool_prefix}ar", so it can be a program name with args.

-echo "configure:2717: checking for $ac_word" >&5

 # so we should be able to put the 'maybe's in unconditionally and
 # leave out the maybe dependencies when enable_gdbtk is false.  I'm not
 # 100% sure that that's safe though.
+
+gdb_tk="maybe-all-tcl maybe-all-tk maybe-all-itcl maybe-all-tix maybe-all-libgui"

-    GDB_TK="maybe-all-tcl maybe-all-tk maybe-all-itcl maybe-all-tix maybe-all-libgui" ;;
